centralLabelPrinting.title: Central Label Printing
centralLabelPrinting.confirmPrompt: I confirm the label is printed successfully.

labelShipping.confirmPrompt: I confirm that labels were shipped.

collectionPatientVerification.verifyPatientDescription: Verify patient name and date of birth using a government issued identity document
collectionPatientVerification.verifyPrompt: I verify the identity of the patient has been verified.
collectionPatientVerification.confirmPrompt: I confirm the identity of the patient has been verified.

collectionIdentification.scanEnterDin: Scan or enter the DIN/Unique Donation Number/Apheresis ID.
collectionIdentification.scanEnterDinSec: Scan or enter the DIN/SEC-DIS/Apheresis ID.
collectionIdentification.verifySites: Verify your siteâ€™s pre-collection label has been affixed to the cell collection bag.

collectionLabelPrinting.verifyApheresis: Verify the apheresis label has been affixed to the collection bag
collectionLabelPrinting.confirmPrompt: I confirm the Apheresis label has been affixed to the Collection bag.

bagDataEntry.scanEnterCoi: Scan or enter the COI Bag Identifier from the apheresis bag.
bagDataEntry.enterStartEndTime: Enter Start and End Time of Collection

collectionSummaryPage.startTime: Start time (24H): Time at which blood begins to enter the apheresis disposable
collectionSummaryPage.endTime: End time (24H): Completion of apheresis procedure at end of rinseback
collectionSummaryPage.descriptionConfirm: We hereby confirm that apheresis collection and labeling was performed according to the specifications described in the Cell Therapy Product Procedures Manual (CTPPM) provided by Janssen and following Internal Quality procedures under responsibility of the Tissue/Blood Establishment Responsible Person.
collectionSummaryPage.verifyPrompt: I verify that the information entered is complete and accurate.
collectionSummaryPage.confirmPrompt: I confirm that the information entered is complete and accurate.

handOff.scanBagId: Scan or enter the Bag ID to confirm hand-off
handOff.confirmPrompt: I confirm the cell collection bag has been transferred to an appropriate party.

handOffReceipt.scanBagId: Scan or enter the Bag ID to confirm receipt

transferProductToShipperTranslations.scanLn2Shipper: Scan or enter the COI number on the LN2 shipper label.
transferProductToShipperTranslations.transferBagDescription: Transfer the bag into the shipper and scan the COI number on the shipper label to capture the timestamp of this step.

collectionShipmentChecklist.airwayBill: Air Waybill Number or Shipment Tracking Identification
collectionShipmentChecklist.confirmMnc: Confirm MNC, Apheresis was not exposed to ambient temperature greater than 60 minutes.
collectionShipmentChecklist.listOfSerialNumber: List the serial number of the temperature monitoring device (if applicable to your country): (Optional)
collectionShipmentChecklist.listOfSecuritySeal: List the security seal number on the shipper (if applicable to your country): (Optional)
collectionShipmentChecklist.idmSamples: Has the infectious disease marker (IDM) samples been placed into the shipper? If not applicable, select NO and then enter 'N/A' in comments box under question
collectionShipmentChecklist.tempratureMonitor: Has the temperature monitor been activated?
collectionShipmentChecklist.additionalComments: Please enter additional comments about the shipment. (Optional)

cryopreservation.numberOfBags: Number of bags formulated for cryopreservation?
cryopreservation.scanCoiIdentifier: Scan or enter the COI identifier on the bag label (Bag 1).
cryopreservation.scanCoiBag: Scan or enter the COI Bag Identifier on the cassette label (Bag 1).
cryopreservation.verifyLabels: Verify labels have been attached to all collection bags
cryopreservation.scanEnterCoi: Scan or Enter the COI-based bag identifier for moving bag to storage (Bag 1)
cryopreservation.scanBagIdentifier: Scan or enter the bag identifier prior to entering bag details (Bag 1)
cryopreservation.scannedShipper: Scanned shipper label upon receipt of Apheresis product at cell processing lab
cryopreservation.numberOfBagsFormulated: Number of bags formulated for cryopreservation
cryopreservation.scanEnterBagIdentifier: Scan or enter the bag identifier prior to entering bag details (Bag 1)
cryopreservation.dateTimeCryopreservation: Date/Time Cryopreserved Apheresis Product cassette placed into LN2 storage

shipping.shippingContainerCaseIntact: Is the shipping container case intact? If the shipping container is damaged or not in expected condition, please contact Janssen.
shipping.shippingContainerIntactLclp: Is the shipping container case intact? If the shipping container is damaged or not in expected condition, please contact your Janssen Cell Therapy Coordinator.
shipping.temperatureAlarmReceived: Was there a temperature out-of-range alarm received? If yes, contact Janssen immediately and do NOT proceed until further instructions are given
shipping.temperatureAlarmReceivedLclp: Was there a temperature out-of-range alarm received? If yes, please contact your Janssen Cell Therapy Coordinator immediately and do NOT proceed until further instructions are given.
shipping.importantNote: IMPORTANT: Please place the cryopreserved apheresis product into the liquid nitrogen shipper as soon as possible and ensure all checks have been performed and verified. The frozen bag is fragile. Always handle the cassette with frozen bag with care and maintain control at all times.
shipping.removeCassette1: Remove cassette 1 from storage and scan to capture the time of this step. Next, transfer the cassette into the LN2 shipper and scan the COI number on the LN2 shipper label to capture the timestamp of this step.
shipping.scanEnterCoiBagIdentifier: Scan or enter the COI Bag Identifier on the cassette label (Bag 1)
shipping.CoiNumberLn2ShipperLabel: Scan or enter the COI number on the LN2 shipper label.
shipping.cryopreservedApheresisProduct: Confirm cryopreserved apheresis product cassette(s) were not exposed to ambient temperature greater than 3 minutes
shipping.rackOnCassetteRack: Is the red wire tamper seal labeled "RACK" in place on the cassette rack?
shipping.waybillNumber: Please enter air waybill number for shipment.
shipping.shipperLabelId: Shipper Label ID for the shipment
shipping.digitsEvoisNumber: Please enter the last 4 digits of the EVO-IS Number on the LN2 shipper lid
shipping.airWaybillMatchEvoisNumber: Does the EVO-IS Number listed on the Air Waybill match the EVO-IS Number on the LN2 shipper lid?
shipping.ln2ShipperLid: Is the red wire tamper seal in place for the LN2 shipper lid?
shipping.tamperSealNumber: Please enter the Tamper Seal Number on LN2 shipper lid.
shipping.tamperSealNumberListed: Does the Tamper Seal Number listed on the Air Waybill match the Tamper Seal Number on the LN2 shipper lid?
shipping.shipperLabel: Is the shipper label(s) included with the shipper?
shipping.packingInsert: Is the packing insert(s) included with the shipper?
shipping.consigneeKit: Is the Consignee kit pouch included with the shipper?
shipping.additionalComments: Please enter additional comments about the shipment.
shipping.consigneeKitSummary: Is the Consignee Kit pouch included with the shipper?
shipping.bagIdCryopreserved: Bag ID of Cryopreserved Product cassette removed from cell lab LN2 storage.
shipping.waybillNumberSummary: Please enter air waybill number for shipment.
shipping.shipperLabelIdLn2Shipper: Shipper label ID of the closed LN2 shipper containing packaged Cryopreserved Apheresis product cassette.
